dbl.name: Doubloon (DBL)
dbl.description: Doubloon is the Arbitrum native governance token for Galleon

ethmaxy.name: ETH Max Yield Index (ETHMAXY)
ethmaxy.description: ETHMAXY is the best leveraged $ETH liquid staking strategy in DeFi today, all within one tradable ERC20 token.

bye.name: Basis Yield ETH Index (BYE)
bye.description: BYE is an ERC20 composable structured product that executes a high yield, cash-and-carry delta-neutral strategy.

spi.name: Spartan Index (SPI)
spi.description: The Spartan Index is part of Galleon's thematic Portfolios suite allowing holders of $SPI to capture the upside in the popular narrative surrounding the rise of synthetix ecosystem based projects on the growing Optimism Layer 2 network.

fees.name: Crypto Fees Index (FEES)
fees.description: The Crypto Fees Index is part of Galleon's thematic Portfolios suite allowing holders of $FEES to capture the upside in the popular narrative surrounding investing in protocols and networks that are generating significant fees on a relative basis across the ecosystem.

merge.name: Merge Index (MERGE)
merge.description: The Merge Index is part of Galleon's thematic Portfolios suite allowing holders of $MERGE to capture the upside in the highly anticipated event surrounding the upcoming merge on Ethereum, moving the entire network to Proof of Stake (PoS).

vote.name: veToken Index (VOTE)
vote.description: The veToken Index is part of Galleon's thematic Portfolios suite allowing holders of $VOTE to capture the upside in the popular narrative surrounding the rise of voting escrow tokens that direct emissions within the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem.
